name: Fantasy 5D - An Erotic Quest
description: In this adult visual novel you will take the role of a video game's genius, his spicy girlfriend and his nerdy best friend who, during the creation of a 5d videogame, will be transported into a fantasy world, trapped into the characters they are creating: a rude barbarian hero, a submissive goblin girl and a futanari half-ork... In order to come back to the their previous life, they will face a lot of spicy quests and will meet a lot of strange, horny, and perverted creatures!..."
